item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 21 Jun 2022
item.description:
1. OBazl Toolsuite - tools for building OCaml with Bazel
  2. Job offer: 3 years compiler engineer at the French tax authority
  3. OCaml 5.0, zeroth alpha release
  4. Tezt, a framework for all your tests
  5. OCaml Stdlib, Containers, Batteries, Base and F# core functions comparisons
  6. Dune 3.3.0
